name.description: Property. A string which denotes the name of the camera

serialNumber.description: Property. A string which denotes the serial number of the camera

brand.description: Property. A string which denotes the brand of the camera

model.description: Property. A string which denotes the model of the camera

dateCreated.description: Property. A timestamp which denotes when this entity has been created.

startDateTime.description: Property. A timestamp which denotes when the camera has started the initialization.

endDateTime.description: Property. A timestamp which denotes when the camera has completed the initialization.

status.description: Property. A string which denotes the camera status.

hardwareTrigger.description: Property. A boolean which denotes whether the hardware trigger mode is active or not.

exposure.description: Property. A number which denotes the camera exposure.

error.description: Property. A string which denotes whether errors have occurred
